name: V WORDS!: WIN Cash Prizes
description:
You read it right! Every-single-day, solve 3-rounds of V WORDS! for a chance to win the daily cash pot prize at 5:30PM PST with fellow players … worldwide.

Take the edge off a tiring ordinary day with V WORDS!, an exciting and inspiring game that will keep you playing every day. Our simple goal, "To inspire personal growth one cash game at a time!"

Learn something new to inspire and motivate you to level-up in life. You really need this daily push, we’ll keep you moving, motivated and going for your goals. Carefully curated, fresh and new word puzzles every day. Each round, definitely an “ah ha!” moment you’d remember. Stay sharp with V WORDS!

V WORDS!, a familiar game the whole world knows! Free mobile word-puzzle app that brings the excitement to your iPhones today.

WIN and split cash pot prizes daily with fellow players worldwide.

DOWNLOAD V WORDS! for free!

o WIN REAL MONEY, no purchases necessary!
o Chat with fellow players, make friends, learn new cultures.

It’s easy to play V WORDS!

• Create an unique and personal V WORDS! player account.
• Start by selecting two consonants and 1 vowel to start at the beginning of each word puzzle round (you can change under Settings).
• Join the daily live games at 5:30 PM PST.
• At a 3-second interval, choose a new letter (penalty-free).
• At any time, click “Solve” to fill in the missing letters and click "Enter".
• Solve three rounds to be eligible for a cash prize.

Good luck, LEARN, PLAY and HAVE FUN!
